ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I definitely recommend the course for someone who would like a survey of current research in neuroscience, from animal research to social neuroscience.
This course is ideal for someone who would like a survey of current research in neuroscience, from animal behavior to human social neuroscience.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course helped me get an idea of current topics in neuroscience, which will greatly contribute to my research. I especially appreciated meeting faculty personally, which helped deepen my knowledge of both the discipline and the profession.
This course greatly deepened my knowledge of the profession - especially because we got the chance to meet speakers personally.
